root.name: Fortnite
root.description: OverviewFortnite is Epic Games' first Unreal Engine 4 game and will be released for PC, but might be brought to other platforms later. It is slated to be released sometime during 2013.Currently, not much is known about the game; what is known, however, is that it will be a class-based co-op survival game. The game will feature a day/night cycle whereby players must scavenge items and build during the daytime, then defend against attacking zombies during nighttime using various weapons and traps.
